rukus.text: 54|23|Samudo (mo mata) keikoku o kyogidearu to shita.
54|24|Soshite kare-ra wa itta. `Nani to, watashi-tachi no naka no ikkai no ningende wanaidesu ka. Doshite kon'na mono ni shitagaimasu ka. Sore koso jado, kichigaizatadesu.
54|25|Watashi-tachi no ma de kare dake ni keiji ga kudasa reta nodesu ka. Iya, kare wa ouso-tsukidesu.'
54|26|(Ose rareta. ) `Kare-ra wa ashita shirudearou. Dochira ga daiuso-tsukidearu ka o.
54|27|Hontoni ware wa, kare-ra o kokoromiru tame mesu rakuda o okurudearou. Anata wa taeshinobi kare-ra o mimamore.
54|28|Soshite kare-ra ni rakuda to mizu o bunpai shi, junban ni nomu yo tsutae nasai.
54|29|Daga kare-ra wa nakama o yobiyose, sono otoko wa (ken o) te ni toru to hiza no ken o kitte shimatta.
54|30|Sonotoki no waga chobatsu to imashime to ga dodeatta ka.
54|31|Hontoni ware wa, kare-ra ni mukakkate (mimi o tsunzaku) hitokoe o kudasu to, kare-ra wa kachiku no kakoi ni tsukawareru kare kabu no yo ni natta.
54|32|Ware wa, kuruan o yasashiku toki mei shita. Sate, dareka satoru mono ga aru ka.
54|33|Ruto no min mo keikoku o kyogidearu to shita.
54|34|Ware wa saseki no arashi o kare-ra ni okutta. Ruto no kazoku dake wa betsudeatta. Reimei ni kare-ra o sukui,
54|35|ware kara no onkei to shita. Ko no yo ni ware wa kansha suru mono ni mukuiru.
54|36|(Ruto wa) waga chobatsu o kare-ra ni keikoku shita nodaga, kare-ra wa sono keikoku ni tsuite giwaku no nen o daita.
54|37|Soshite kare no hinkyaku (tenshi) o, kare kara ubaou to shitanode, ware wa kare-ra no me o tsubushita. `Sa, waga chobatsu to keikoku o ajiwae.'
54|38|Akuru asa, eien no chobatsu ga kare-ra ni kudatta.
54|39|`Sa waga chobatsu to keikoku o ajiwae.'
54|40|Ware wa, kuruan o yasashiku toki mei shita. Sa, dareka satoru mono ga aru ka.
